about_the_game:
From Classic to Modern – Discover Firearms from Fabryka Broni Radom in Gunsmith Simulator!

Fabryka Broni Radom is a place where tradition meets innovation, supplying the world with reliable and highly regarded firearms for over a century. In the Fabryka Broni Radom DLC, you’ll have the opportunity to repair both historical and modern models from this legendary Polish firearms manufacturer.

This DLC features four exceptional models:

  • VIS Pistol
    An icon of Polish engineering and one of the finest pistol designs of its time. The VIS wz. 35 is a symbol of Fabryka Broni Radom’s tradition, renowned for its reliability worldwide. We’ve meticulously recreated every detail of this iconic firearm, originally produced between 1935 and 1939, to bring it to life in the DLC.

  • MSBS GROT Assault Rifle
    A modern modular firearm system (MSBS) designed to adapt to the user's needs. The GROT is a source of pride for the Polish defense industry, offering versatility and ergonomic design. The C16 FB-A2 version ensures precision, reliability, and user comfort—ideal for both military and special forces.

  • Beryl Assault Rifle
    A battle-tested assault rifle that has become the standard issue for the Polish Armed Forces. The Beryl wz. 96 combines excellent accuracy with a rugged design, blending modern technology with the durability professionals demand.

  • Mini Beryl Compact Assault Rifle
    A compact and lightweight version of the classic Beryl, perfect for close-quarters operations and dynamic engagements. The Mini Beryl wz. 96 delivers mobility without compromising reliability.

Step into the workshop and explore the history and technical details of these legendary firearms. It’s time for tradition to meet your passion in Gunsmith Simulator – Fabryka Broni Radom DLC!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.8 (32-bit), Windows 10N needs installed Media Feature Pack

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400F
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.8 (32-bit), Windows 10N needs installed Media Feature Pack
